text: Ricardo Charles (born 4 June 1983) is a Haitian footballer who plays as a striker. He plays for Victory Sportif Club and the Haiti national football team. ==References== ==External links== * *Caribbean Football Database profile Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Haitian footballers Category:People from Jérémie Category:Victory SC players Category:Ligue Haïtienne players Category:Haiti international footballers
title: Ricardo Charles
